payload.name: Inerita
payload.detect: We have not really checked where inertia was crippling our system: we are assuming it is not because technologies make us believe we are moving forward.

payload.name: Inerita
payload.detect: We have not really checked where inertia was crippling our system: we are assuming it is not because technologies make us believe we are moving forward.

payload.name: Inertia
payload.detect: We have not really checked where inertia was crippling our system: we are assuming it is not because technologies make us believe we are moving forward.

payload.name: Knowledge sharing
payload.detect: Silos are working against us, opinions take over data and facts.
payload.assess: Learning is the constraint: we need to build a culture of learnings and knowledge, knowledge beyond the old and obvious

payload.name: Emergent practices
payload.detect: Although we in the world of software engineering and agility, we have built our processes as "good practices" blocking us from adapting and taking risks where risks and opportunities are the 2 sides of the same coin
payload.assess: Too much focused on following the rules

payload.name: Corporate Governance
payload.purpose:
We need agility which we mean to build the organizational capacity to detect, assess and respond to environmental changes in ways that are purposeful, decisive and grounded in a will to win: where winning is bringing learnings - first - and new approaches and technologies to make speed, quality and low cost compatible to serve our customers. Lean is not a word, it is a way of thinking.

We are engaging every team to take part into this change!
